messages.new_rank: {#server}>{#record} You claimed the {#highlite}{2}{#record}. with a time of {#highlite}{1}{#record}!
messages.rank_none: {#server}>{#record} You must have {1} records on this server before recieving a rank
messages.pb_none: {#server}>{#error} You don't have a record on this map yet...
messages.jukebox: {#server}> {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} ({2}) was added to the jukebox by {#highlite}{3}
